title: Topic 001 Question 061
body: A company has a stateful, long-running workload on a single xlarge general purpose Amazon EC2 On-Demand Instance Metrics show that the service is always using 80% of its available memory and 40% of its available CPU. A SysOps administrator must reduce the cost of the service without negatively affecting performance.
Which change in instance type will meet these requirements?
options: Change to one large compute optimized On-Demand Instance.
Change to one large memory optimized On-Demand Instance.
Change to one xlarge general purpose Spot Instance.
Change to two large general purpose On-Demand Instances.
